messages.subject: Seeking info: post war dumping of swords in Tokyo Bay
messages.msgSnippet: Dear lists, While explaining my Nihonto interest to several fellow members of the local area diver club, I mentioned the post war dumping of swords and related
messages.messageBody:
Dear lists,

While explaining my Nihonto interest to several fellow
members of the local area diver club, I mentioned the
post war dumping of swords and related items into
Tokyo Bay. They were more interested in the topic than
I imagined, and asked if I could put together a
lecture for one of our local dive meetings.

I am not sure how much information is available on
this topic, but I have several months to put it
together- if there is enough.

Any information or photos related to the topic of the
sword surrender and subsequent dumping, such as what
parts (locations) of Tokyo Bay- all would be welcome.

It is an exceptionally good dive club, and I'd like to
do this right if I am going to cross-mix the two
hobbies.

Best regards,

Curran
